definitions.definition: at a time in the future; after the time you are talking about

examples.text: I met her again three years later.
His father died later that year.
We're going to Rome later in the year.
I discovered later that he'd known all about it from the beginning.

definitions.definition: a way of saying goodbye, used by young people
at a time in the future; after the time you are talking about

examples.text: Much later on, she realized what he had meant.

definitions.definition: by a particular time and not after it

examples.text: Please arrive no later than 8 o'clock.

definitions.definition: at some time in the future, even if you are not sure exactly when

examples.text: Sooner or later you will have to make a decision.

definitions.definition: after a short time rather than after a long time

examples.text: We urged them to sort out the problem sooner rather than later.
